document_data.caption: A map showing Sulmor Street and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Sulmor Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Sulmor Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Sulmor Street was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] and also crossed into the eastern section of the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The road ran east to west in between [[Sul Street]] to the east in the Sea Ward and [[Saerdoun Street]] to the west near the outer wall in the North Ward. Other roads intersecting Sulmor Street included [[Shield Street]], [[Copper Street]], the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]], [[Ilzantil Street]], [[Vhezoar Street]], [[Brondar's Way]], [[Whaelgond Way]], [[Ussilbran Street]], and [[Nindabar Street]].
